snippet: In the aftermath of the village massacre in Houla, the Communist Party’s official newspaper called for more patience in giving a peace plan a chance.
lead_paragraph: In the aftermath of the village massacre in Houla, the Communist Party’s official newspaper called for more patience in giving a peace plan a chance.

headline.seo: China Warns West Against Using Force in Syria
